=== Summary ===
Include <nowiki>[[http://www.midokura.com/midonet|MidoNet]]</nowiki> dependencies into next release of Ubuntu

=== Release Note ===

<nowiki>[[http://www.midokura.com/midonet|MidoNet]]</nowiki> is an advanced Software Defined Networking (SDN) solution, which provides network virtualization for public and private cloud environments. If we include all the dependencies, <nowiki>[[http://www.midokura.com/midonet|MidoNet]]</nowiki> will be easily deployed as a back-end for Quantum.

=== Implementation ===

Include MidoNet dependencies in any repo.

List of runtime dependencies:

* <nowiki>[[http://java.com/en/download/index.jsp|Java 7]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/natty/openvswitch-datapath-source|openvswitch-datapath-source]]</nowiki> (version 1.4.2)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/python-keystoneclientt|python-keystoneclient]]</nowiki> (version 2012.1-0ubuntu1)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/python-eventlet]]</nowiki> (version 0.9.16-1ubuntu4.1)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/python-webob|python-webob]]</nowiki> (version 1.1.1-1ubuntu0)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/python-httplib2|python-httplib2]]</nowiki> (version 0.7.2-1ubuntu2)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/zookeeper|Apache Zookeeper]]</nowiki> (version 3.4.1)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/cassandra|Cassandra]]</nowiki> (any version)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/quagga|Quagga]]</nowiki> (version 0.99.21)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/python-novaclient|python-nova]]</nowiki> (version 2012.1.3+stable-20120827-4d2a4a )
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/python-quantumclient|python-quantum-client]]</nowiki> (2012.1-0ubuntu1)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/precise/amd64/python-quantum|python-quantum]]</nowiki> (2012.1-0ubuntu4)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/apache2|Apache2]]</nowiki> (version 2.2.22-1ubuntu1)
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/ssl-cert|ssl-cert]]</nowiki> (version 1.0.28)
